lead_paragraph: Google’s free apps offer an easy way to keep your data current on all your screens, but third-party software can work, too.

headline.print_headline: Syncing a Computer and Android Devices
headline.main: Keeping Your Android Files in Sync With a Computer

snippet: Google’s free apps offer an easy way to keep your data current on all your screens, but third-party software can work, too.
abstract: Tech Tip Q&A; explanation of how to synch computer and Android devices.
